6833b8bc6f8ce71072c4e703 description: Contractor, we have a humanitarian crisis brewing. Hostile factions are targeting UN aid convoys in Woods - but the media needs proof. Plant 5 UNTAR tags near some faction hotspots, put them on a few executed bodies. When the world sees the BEAR and USEC are decimating the blue helmets, donations to our 'operations' will triple. Saving lives through proper optics.
6833b8bc6f8ce71072c4e703 startedMessageT: Plant the tags, stage the bodies, vanish. If they trace this back or you get caught, you're a rogue actor.
6833b8bc6f8ce71072c4e703 successMessageT: Reuters just ran a story condeming PMC factions for their brutal atrocities. Geneva is screaming for sanctions. Our funding is secured... For now.
6833b8bc6f8ce71072c4e703 failMessageText: You compromised the operation. UNTAR is breathing down my neck. If you can't handle the work, don't take the job.
6833b8bc6f8ce71072c4e703 acceptPlayerMes: This isn’t deception - it’s documenting atrocities they’d commit anyway. Get to Woods.
6833b8bc6f8ce71072c4e703 declinePlayerMe: Not interested? Fine. When UNTAR finally gets pushed out, and the scavs are beating down the door to your hideout? Don't call me begging for help.
6833b8bc6f8ce71072c4e703 completePlayerM: Perfect. If you setup the scene well enough, the world will see the atrocities BEAR and USEC are doing - even if we had to rely on some fabrication.
6833b8bc6f8ce71072c4e703 note: Plant UNTAR dog tags on bodies in Woods. Be sure to remain unseen.
6833b5381f542c94c22a2381: Plant UNTAR Dog Tag on dead body at the South-Eastern Bridge, next to the utility shed
6833b53a7e7e09c54a256827: Plant UNTAR Dog Tag on dead body inside the Western shed of the ruined town in the South
6833b53c406cbfdf307f0e05: Plant UNTAR Dog Tag on dead body leaning against Electric Tower before the Southern lakes
683645245a1c12488166b1a5 description: It seems our Swedish friends misplaced a hard drive during their 'audit' of Tarkov’s relief efforts. Retrieve it from their abandoned armored vehicle in Streets. Its contents are of high value to us: tax havens, embargoed tech sales, shipping manifests. This info, in the right hands, could ‘inspire’ Stockholm to reallocate UN aid budgets to our operations. A shame if their arms deals with TerraGroup leaked…
683645245a1c12488166b1a5 startedMessageT: The vehicle’s near Concordia. Expect some private militia along the way — eliminate discreetly. If that drive’s damaged, don't bother returning.
683645245a1c12488166b1a5 successMessageT: Funny, Stockholm just pledged 10,000 antibiotic doses, and sent us some leftover munitions... after I *shared* a few file excerpts. How altruistic of them.
683645245a1c12488166b1a5 acceptPlayerMes: Just be sure to get that drive back to me intact. If we play our cards right, this should be a decent payday.
683645245a1c12488166b1a5 declinePlayerMe: Really? You're that scared of some action in the Streets? Didn't take you for a coward.
683645245a1c12488166b1a5 completePlayerM: Another successful op in the books. We make quite the convincing argument for the cause. Check my stores next time you're around - the Swedes sent us some new shiny metal toys to pay for our silence.
683645245a1c12488166b1a5 note: Retrieve Swedish intel drive from armored vehicle (Streets)
68363e9928ef789b2ccf31a1: Get the hard drive from the APC near the helicopter crash site in Streets
686051774a290eb6f216471f description: The UN tracked down a shipment of weapons that was delivered to Customs. We aren't sure what the weapons are, but I want you to go and track them down and mark the shipment for me!
686051774a290eb6f216471f startedMessageT: Get your ass out there and find that shipment!
686051774a290eb6f216471f successMessageT: Great work on finding that shipment. Turns out that the weapons were absolute garbage!! You can keep two for yourself and I guess I will just sell the rest. Thanks again I suppose.
6860529aac68575f65f0578e: Place a MS2000 Marker on the boxes in the basement of Fortress near the extraction point.
686c25d281071c45d2f8aa44 description: This is urgent! I recently procured a weapon shipment of the M249 SAW, but while my team was delivering it their convoy was ambushed and some of the weapons were stolen. The manifest for the shipment must have been dropped during the ambush and I need it so I know how many of my guns are missing exactly. Go find it for me! Check the Tigr LAV's over at Customs, you will likely find what you need there.
686c25d281071c45d2f8aa44 startedMessageT: Please get that manifest back to me ASAP.
686c25d281071c45d2f8aa44 successMessageT: Incredible! Thank you so much for recovering this!!
686c26481432fe3c84301de9: Find the shipping manifest that is near the Tigr LAVs at Customs
686c26dc34ec5f932401b002: Hand in the shipping manifest to Peacekeeper
686dd4f871840e292fbd1a14 description: Those fucking bastards! I believe I know who attacked my convoy that was carrying my shipment of the M249 SAW! One of my guys told me it looked like those fucking Goons. I need you to go back to Customs and take care of them for me while I figure out why the fuck they stole my guns...I bet those bastards have them stashed somewhere.
686dd4f871840e292fbd1a14 successMessageT: Good fucking work. I'll be honest, I didn't think you would pull this off. Take this reward for helping me out, I already lost a few of these so what is one more right?
